DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify TAB3 transcript/protein molecular marker cancer , specifically testicular , skin , small intestine , pancreatic cancer . - To characterize TAB3 signal network involve tumorigenesis . OUTLINE : Tumor tissue sample paraffin-embedded tissue block analyze TAB3 transcript protein expression use situ hybridization immunostaining TAB3 cRNA probe antibody . Antibodies proteins involve NFkB signal pathway ( e.g. , p65 , TAK1 , MyD88 , Akt ) use immunostaining assay .
